Sergio Marchionne said in the next two to three years, Chrysler and Fiat could ultimately merge to form a single company, adding for all I know it could be based here. But there is a laundry list of things to do before a merger of Fiat and Chrysler could happen, including the refinancing of debt and the IPO, Sergio Marchionne said.
